mapper.select: select * from( select a.id,a.file_name,a.file_name file,a.file_type,a.file_size,a.comments,a.department_id, a.file_type_code, b.text file_type_text, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') created_time, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') update_time, a.created_user_id, (select name from sys_user where id = a.created_user_id) created_user_name, a.update_user_id, (select name from sys_user where id = a.update_user_id) update_user_name from t_file a, t_code_file_type b where a.file_type_code = b.code ) a where 1=1 and file_name like "%"#{file_name}"%" and file_type = #{file_type} and file_type_code = #{file_type_code} and created_user_id = #{created_user_id} and created_user_name like "%"#{created_user_name}"%" and department_id = #{department_id} and created_time >= #{created_time_start} and created_time <= #{created_time_end} order by a.created_time
select file_path from t_file where id = #{id}
